Articles.Content:
I can't seem to edit this craft. Happened after I put one of the NASA SRB's under the ship, then 8 around it, put a strut on each of the 8 radial ones and then tried to connect to the Rockomax-64.

However, other craft work fine, you can make a new one, or edit old ones. Only this one is broken.

(Darn, I lost the 6-man capsule. )

LOG FILE DOWNLOAD
Having same issue. Restarted and deleted ship file. Waiting to see if it happens again.
